high_impact_recommendations.primary_issue: High Emission Factor and High Total Weight

specific_actions: Switch from Blast Furnace (BF) steel to Electric Arc Furnace (EAF) steel, which typically has a 50-75% lower carbon footprint.
Verify chain-of-custody for the new steel source to ensure compliance with business requirements.
proposed_strategies.expected_outcome: A potential reduction of >30% in product emissions, directly addressing the 15% portfolio reduction target.

specific_actions: Conduct topological optimization to identify areas where material can be removed without compromising structural integrity (lightweighting).
Ensure any design changes maintain existing production takt times.
proposed_strategies.expected_outcome: Reduction in raw material usage, linearly decreasing emissions and material costs.

specific_actions: Replace virgin plastic with at least 40% Post-Consumer Recycled (PCR) plastic to align with the corporate goal of increasing recycled material use.
Validate that the PCR material does not increase unit cost by more than 5%.
proposed_strategies.expected_outcome: Significant reduction in emission factor and progress towards the 40% recycled content objective.

medium_impact_recommendations.primary_issue: Moderate Emission Factor and High Quantity

specific_actions: Implement standardized sustainability scorecards for cotton suppliers to prioritize those using renewable energy or regenerative farming.
Negotiate contracts to include organic cotton options within the 5% cost increase cap.
proposed_strategies.expected_outcome: Lower agricultural emissions and improved supplier transparency.

strategic_summary.overall_recommendation: Prioritize the transition to EAF steel for the Steel Frame immediately, as this single action yields the highest ROI for carbon reduction and is critical for meeting the 15% reduction target.
strategic_summary.synergy_opportunities: Combine supplier engagement efforts for Steel, Plastic, and Cotton under the new 'Standardized Supplier Sustainability Scorecard' initiative to streamline procurement and enforce environmental standards across all categories.
